summary:
I have a positive approach, I have a lot of experience in bank operations and result oriented. Furthermore I am also direct, quick learner, initiative taker, accurate, energetic, friendly and punctual.

Specialties: banking,  computer skills,  credit,  customer relations,  debit,  documentation,  dutch,  english,  executive management,  front office,  languages,  legal,  ,  management,  max,  ,  microsoft word,  production,  recruiting,  reports,  sales,  supervisory skills,  swift,   treasury,  turkish,  workflow analysis,  writing,
